knimeNode.name: Workflow Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Write the current workflow to a FSX file.

fullDescription.intro: Write the current workflow with all its nodes and connections except the workflow reader itself. This workflow will be copied and saved in a meta node. The output ports of the selected node will be exported using the output ports of the meta node.
fullDescription.option: Location to file. May be an absolute URL, a mount-point relative URL or a local path.
